name: Chocolate Chip Pizza
author: doc2813
summary: Took sister's chocolate chip cookie recipe and expanded it to fit a pizza pan to fill daughter's request for my granddaughter's birthday. Use your favorite frosting. I added whipped cream and cream cheese icing. Everyone seemed to enjoy!
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Lightly spray an 18-inch pizza pan with cooking spray
Combine shortening, white sugar, brown sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract in a large bowl
Beat with an electric mixer until creamy
Mix flour, salt, and baking soda together
Stir in chocolate chips to finish cookie dough
Spoon dough into the center of the prepared pizza pan
Press dough from the center towards the rim of the pan
Bake in the preheated oven until edges are firm and center looks set, 10 to 12 minutes
